Question & Options:
What roles or relationships do the tree, WALL·E, Axiom, and Earth have in the context of the movie *WALL-E*?
Options:
A. A) The tree symbolizes the revival of life on Earth.
B. B) WALL·E is a cleaning robot on the Axiom spaceship.
C. C) The Axiom spaceship returns to Earth after a long absence.
D. D) The tree is a source of rest for WALL·E and EVE.
Correct Answer: A) The tree symbolizes the revival of life on Earth., B) WALL·E is a cleaning robot on the Axiom spaceship., C) The Axiom spaceship returns to Earth after a long absence., D) The tree is a source of rest for WALL·E and EVE.
